data.text: @singgenberg @ximuoicay They have to choose between "zero covid" and "'cohabitation' with covid". Defo choose the later bcs if they what to stop the spreading, it means more social distancing and less workers at industrial parks, then less foreign investment 😭
@ximuoicay This is mainly due to Omicron, but at least the secerity and the death cases are not rising together with cases. Still, it is a lot.

@ximuoicay I'm planning to visit in April and I'm terrified seeing these latest stats.

Feels like all govs have given up on safety measures.
@ximuoicay VN was doing well for so long containing the virus. do you think this is due to the transmission rate of omicron or some other factors?
